Headline: #94 California, #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan and Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California and 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California and #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Division, Cicero, Fullerton and Homan due to street blockage near Homan and Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd- and Midway-bound Green and Orange Line Service Delayed at Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 63rd- and Midway-bound Green and Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd- and Midway-bound Green and Orange Line trains are standing at Roosevelt due to fire department activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses requested for connecting service.

  • Orange Line shuttles: between State/Lake and Halsted.
  • Green Line shuttles: between State/Lake and Cermak-McCormick Place.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
